name: The Organisation for Professionals in Regulatory Affairs
memberOrga: None - TOPRA is an organisation of individual professionals only
goal:
Vision -
Enabling and promoting excellence for the healthcare regulatory profession

Mission -
To represent and promote the global healthcare regulatory profession; and to provide to its members top-quality, relevant support with a European focus
interests: Education, Enterprise, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: all activities related to the regulation of human and veterinary healthcare products, including devices, ATMP and pharma and biotech
